Close_combat
-------------------------------
Map initial ideas from Sam Cambridge and Sam Candlin. Created by Sam Candlin ([vK™] Candyman). hope that you all enjoy the map as much as we all do at [vK™].

I suggest a download just to see if you like the map really, give it a try ;)
--------------------------------

Reccomended Players: 12
Objective: Kill opposition :)

--------------------------------
[vK™] Candyman
--------------------------------
